nodes.text: A Throneship was the personal vessel of a member of the Anoat sector's Noble Court. Such ships had gilded hallways. Captain Regmus commanded the Throneship Honorbound until it was lost to the Galactic Empire.

During the Iron Blockade, a baron hosted a formal dinner aboard his Throneship, and a young smuggler sent an envoy as a demonstration of friendship. At some other point during the blockade, three Throneships were scheduled to participate in a battle simulation, readying their crews for potential conflicts. At yet some other point, an Imperial stealth team infiltrated a Throneship. The Smuggler joined the nobles in the ensuing fight.
